        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • checkAMOrPM

        public static boolean checkAMOrPM(String token)
        This method will use regex to check if a given date is am, AM, pm, or PM.
        Parameters:
        token - a token in string format
        Returns:
        true if it is either am, AM, pm, or PM, otherwise false
